slim_seo.title: Bumbaween - The Drake
slim_seo.description: OhBumbaRassClot presents the 4th Annual BUMBAWEEN! ($25 only) ONLINE TICKETS – SOLDOUT On Halloween night, Bumba is taking over The Drake Hotel Lounge for the spookiest, wildest costume party in the city. Come dressed in your best Halloween look for a chance to win $150 cash! sounds by POGI, @_callmepogi Chanl Mashl, @chanlmarshl Ace Dillinger, @ace_dillinger DJ BXNNY, @itsdjbxnny Expect nothing but the hottest spooky vibes from dancehall to soca, afrobeats to hip hop. Don’t miss the Halloween event everyone will be talking about. BUMBAWEEN is back… and scarier than ever!
